Uses of Package
com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation

  • Packages that use com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation 
    Package Description
    com.salesforce.omakase.ast
    Contains general AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) units, such as Rule and top-level AST interfaces, such as Syntax, Commentable and Refinable.
    com.salesforce.omakase.ast.atrule
    Contains at-rule AST members.
    com.salesforce.omakase.ast.declaration
    Contains declaration AST members.
    com.salesforce.omakase.ast.extended
    Contains customized, extended syntax objects that are not part of the standard CSS spec.
    com.salesforce.omakase.ast.selector
    Contains selector AST members.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.conditionals
    Plugins related to the custom syntax for conditionals.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.core
    Core plugins.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.misc
    Other misc plugins.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.prefixer
    Plugins related to automatic vendor prefixing.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.syntax
    Plugins related to standard syntax refinement parsing.
    com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.validator
    Plugins that perform validation.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.ast 
    Class and Description
    Description
    Description of a Subscribable type.
    Subscribable
    Indicates that a Syntax unit can be subscribed to within a Plugin.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.ast.atrule 
    Class and Description
    Description
    Description of a Subscribable type.
    Subscribable
    Indicates that a Syntax unit can be subscribed to within a Plugin.

  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.ast.extended

    Description of a Subscribable type.

  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.ast.selector 
    Class and Description
    Description
    Description of a Subscribable type.
    Subscribable
    Indicates that a Syntax unit can be subscribed to within a Plugin.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.conditionals 
    Class and Description
    Observe
    Use this annotation to subscribe to Syntax objects when the method will not change any aspect of the CSS or object.
    Refine
    Use this annotation to subscribe to unrefined Syntax objects in order to provide or trigger refinement on them.
    Validate
    Use this annotation for methods that validate and report errors to an ErrorManager.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.core 
    Class and Description
    Observe
    Use this annotation to subscribe to Syntax objects when the method will not change any aspect of the CSS or object.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.misc 
    Class and Description
    Rework
    Use this annotation to subscribe to Syntax objects when the method is expected to change or modify the object/source code.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.prefixer 
    Class and Description
    Rework
    Use this annotation to subscribe to Syntax objects when the method is expected to change or modify the object/source code.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.syntax 
    Class and Description
    Refine
    Use this annotation to subscribe to unrefined Syntax objects in order to provide or trigger refinement on them.
  • Classes in com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.annotation used by com.salesforce.omakase.plugin.validator 
    Class and Description
    Validate
    Use this annotation for methods that validate and report errors to an ErrorManager.
